book: 2692-Glo Skin Beauty Purifying gel Cleanser  (2020 formulation)

chunk: Directions: Apply a small amount of the purifying gel cleanser into wet hands. Massage onto dampened face using light, circular movements for 60 seconds. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Follow with Purifying Mist. Use twice daily.
book: 2692-Glo Skin Beauty Purifying gel Cleanser  (2020 formulation)
